items.sentence: My doctor recommended that I eat more vegetables.
My doctor told me that I should drink more water.
My father can speak French better than my mother.
My father used to bring me here when I was a kid.
My father will come home at the end of this week.
That kind of thing can\'t be found just anywhere.
Tom and Mary always talk to each other in French.
Tom and Mary are always flirting with each other.
Tom and Mary are as different as black and white.
Tom and Mary are getting married in three months.
Tom and Mary are going to be here in ten minutes.
Tom and Mary are playing catch in the front yard.
I haven\'t understood anything that you\'ve said.
How do you think Tom is going to propose to Mary?
How do you think your friends would describe you?
How has advertising changed since you were a kid?
How long did it take for the ambulance to arrive?
How long do you think the negotiations will take?
How long does it take to get to Boston from here?
Mt. Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
My car stalled in the middle of the intersection.
My daughter has grown out of all her old clothes.
My decision to study abroad surprised my parents.
My father is two years younger than my mother is.
I caught a big fish yesterday with my bare hands.
I cut my finger while trying to open the package.
It\'ll take me a long time to get over this cold.
I read your report and found it very interesting.
I think the person I saw talking to Tom was Mary.
Do you know how many millionaires live in Boston?
Everyone on the bus was asleep except the driver.
Except for Tom, everybody seems to be having fun.
Experts have offered three possible explanations.
How did you know Tom wasn\'t planning to do that?
How do you know Tom wasn\'t the one who did that?
My mother is busy planting flowers in the garden.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are wrong about that.
Can you understand the meaning of this paragraph?
Could you tell me how to get to the Hilton Hotel?
Could you tell me the way to the station, please?
She started pursuing him before he became famous.
She wanted him to say that he would pay the bill.
Since it stopped raining, he went out for a walk.
Everybody knows that that\'s not going to happen.
Tom is a man\'s name and Mary is a woman\'s name.
Tom unwrapped his sandwich and started eating it.
Tom usually accomplishes whatever he tries to do.
Could we have a table in the non-smoking section?
Cover your mouth when you cough, sneeze, or yawn.
Did Tom say how he was planning to get to Boston?
